title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5014.1 - License requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5014.1 - License requirement

State Regulations

No person shall carry on a business in which such person
acts as agent for another person in purchasing a lottery ticket, unless such
person is duly licensed as a courier service pursuant to this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5014.1

Adopted

New

York State Register April 10, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 15, eff. 4/10/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
